methods.getParamNames:
Get all known scope variable names.

:return: (java.util.Set<java.lang.String>) A collection of scope variable names.
methods.hasParamName:
Check if the scope has the given name.

:param name: (java.lang.String) - param name
:return: (boolean) True iff the scope has the given param name
methods.putObjectFields:
Add an object's public members (referenced reflectively, not a shallow copy!) to this scope if supported.
 Note: This is an optional method.

:param object: (java.lang.Object) - object to add public members from.
methods.putParam:
Add a parameter to the scope.

Note: Java generics information - <T>

:param name: (java.lang.String) - parameter name.
:param value: (T) - parameter value.
methods.readParamValue:
Get the value of a given scope parameter by name.

*Overload 1*  
  Note: Java generics information - <T>
  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - parameter name.
  :return: (T) parameter value.
  
*Overload 2*  
  Note: Java generics information - <T>
  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - parameter name.
  :param defaultValue: (T) - default parameter value.
  :return: (T) parameter value, or the default parameter value, if the value is not present.
